price: But there are some people who sell their souls[105] to seek Allah’s pleasure, and Allah is Most Gracious to His slaves.
arabic: وَمِنَ ٱلنَّاسِ مَن يَشۡرِي نَفۡسَهُ ٱبۡتِغَآءَ مَرۡضَاتِ ٱللَّهِۚ وَٱللَّهُ رَءُوفُۢ بِٱلۡعِبَادِ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wamina al-nāsi man yashrī nafsahu ib'tighāa marḍāti al-lahi wal-lahu raūfun bil-ʿibādi
